title: The Pragmatic Programmer
author: Andrew Hunt, David Thomas
description: Journey to mastery in software craftsmanship with practical tips and best practices.

title: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
author: Robert C. Martin
description: Principles and best practices for writing clean, maintainable code.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A sweeping narrative of human history from the Stone Age to the 21st century.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: Classic novel of race and injustice in the Deep South.

title: A Brief History of Time
author: Stephen Hawking
description: An accessible overview of cosmology, black holes, and the big bang.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
author: Thomas H. Cormen, Charles E. Leiserson, Ronald L. Rivest, Clifford Stein
description: Comprehensive textbook on algorithms and data structures.

title: The Design of Everyday Things
author: Don Norman
description: Fundamentals of design and user-centered product development.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A portrait of the Jazz Age and the American dream.

title: The Diary of a Young Girl
author: Anne Frank
description: The wartime diary of Anne Frank, a Jewish girl in hiding during WWII.

title: Algorithms to Live By: The Computer Science of Human Decisions
author: Brian Christian, Tom Griffiths
description: Applying algorithms to everyday human decision-making.
